name: enhancer
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
something that is used to strengthen or improve the quality of something. Enhancer is usually used as a combining form: mood enhancer Music can be a mood enhancer.flavour enhancer I don't like to use artificial flavour enhancers in my cooking.
